text: Georgy Yakovlevich Martyniuk (Russian: Гео́ргий Я́ковлевич Мартыню́к; 3 March 1940 – 13 February 2014)Скончался народный артист России Георгий Мартынюк was a Russian movie and theater actor. He was born in Orenburg on 3 March 1930. Martyniuk graduated from the Russian Academy of Theatre Arts in 1962."О НАГРАЖДЕНИИ ГОСУДАРСТВЕННЫМИ НАГРАДАМИ РОССИЙСКОЙ ФЕДЕРАЦИИ" In 2003, he received the People's Artist of Russia honor. He was married to actress Valentina Martyniuk (Russian: Валентина Мартынюк). He died on 13 February 2014 in Moscow, after a long illness in Moscow, Russia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2014 deaths Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:1940 births Category:Disease-related deaths in Russia Category:Actors from Moscow
title: Georgy Martyniuk
